text: @AaronBlake @PressSec Prove it! Oh wait, u cant! I know for a fact that though that over 60,000 people r dead because @realDonaldTrump didn't do a damn thing to stop  #CoronavirusPandemic from coming here since NOVEMBER! He does a great job of splitting this country apart.
